pageContext.description: "An armlet worn above the elbow." The thickest part is the outside edge (as regards thickness of material). A is not so well preserved as B. A is inclined to be crumbly.
pageContext.patina: Green, of various shades. Slightly polished.
pageContext.surface: Smooth. A brownish encrustment at one end.
pageContext.other: Length: A 87mm; B 82mm,Width: A 12mm to 13mm; B 12.5mm to 14mm,Thickness: about 10 mm,Weight: A 27.45 gms; B 24.8 gms; Total 52.25 gms
pageContext.associations: 2 pieces of another armlet of similar design, but a little smaller.
pageContext.collection: Colchester Museum,Acton Collection (EAS) Mus. No. MCXLV-VIII
